mathematica: q = 15; Join[{a = 1}, Table[a = (q - n)*a/(n + 1), {n, 0, q - 1}]] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jul 09 2011 *)Binomial[15,Range[0,15]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jul 12 2014 *)
